name: Sports Guys STACKED!
description:
Stack the sports guys in groups of 4 so they can escape their athletic prison....

Made for the Mini Jam 8/8/2021 - My first ever game jam entry!

All music, graphics, and code is by me. 3 stock sound effects are used.

Warning: I had to submit a few hours early due to work. Unfortunately there are a couple of bugs that I wasn't able to solve in time. 

KNOWN BUGS:

- occasionally, stacking 4 guys won't trigger the points and they will remain on the field. just add more guys to the stack and they will trigger eventually.

-straight lines of 4 guys doesn't work. in fact, a few shapes don't work for some reason. i will probably update later to include all combinations of 4 guys :-)

- sometimes the squeaky noise starts infinitely playing and its very annoying. ah well
